column5: MERRY CHRISTMAS to all my FAMILY here at OFC ... May you all celebrate in Peace and Happiness..... Kelvin AKA Loonietoon
Merry Christmas OFC !!!! Have a safe and healthy new year !
Best of health to all for without it, life can be pretty bad.   Play safe on the ice, don't want any more stats.
Merry Christmas Kelvin
Same to you Bruce and your Family
Merry Christmas and happy New Years wishes to all of the fine people on this site.  Stay safe and do a good deed for someone everyday.  Rick and Dianne.
Merry Christmas Kelvin and everyone else here too.
yep, yep, hope everyone has a safe and happy holidays.
Same to you Lew & Diane also...And the rest of your Family
Merry Christmas Kelvin! And Merry Christmas everyone here on OFC!
What the heck has that guy got at the curb?? Merry Xmas, Y'all
Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!
Merry Christmas to all of my friends and OFC family. Thank you for another wonderful year here with all of you.  Art
Merry Christmas to all
Merry Christmas everyone. Best wishes for a safe holiday and prosperous New Year.
Merry Christmas to all.
Same back to you Dax and all the best in the new year
Same to you Art
Merry Christmas
I now know. Never watched the movie til today. LOL
How have you not see that movie till now?!?!?!

Im old fashion. BITE ME LOL Just streaming christmas movies to keep the grandaughter laughing. Home alone was before. Here laugh filled my heart. Dont think the miss,s liked it when I yelled at the same time. IMADEMYFAMILYDISAPPEAR.
